DESCRIPTION: TODO: Make your own epic keywords
#yDrive #yPoints are used to fuel Sora's #yDrive #yForms and other abilities.
You can only be in one #yDrive #yForm at a time and cannot gain #yDrive #yPoints.
You can only be in one #yDrive #yForm at a time. Every other attack played adds a *Shiv to your hand.
You can only be in one #yDrive #yForm at a time. Whenever you play a card, gain #b2 Block.
If the last card played also had #yCombo, trigger this cards #yCombo effect.
If you are in #yValor #yForm trigger this cards #yStrong effect.
If you are in #yWisdom #yForm trigger this cards #yWise effect.
